metadata.name: AWS EC2 VM Export Failure
metadata.comment: An attempt to export an AWS EC2 instance has been detected. A VM Export might indicate an attempt to extract information from an instance.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM datastore_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(api.operation) = lower('createinstanceexporttask') AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('ec2.amazonaws.com') AND NOT (startswith(lower(api.response.message), lower('')) OR startswith(lower(api.response.code), lower('')) OR contains(lower(api.response.data), lower('failure'))))

output.summary: An attempt to export an AWS EC2 instance has been detected. A VM Export might indicate an attempt to extract information from an instance.
